job.title: Data Engineer
job.description: zoomies help the world connect and deliver happiness while doing it we set out to build the best video conferencing product for the enterprise and today help people communicate better with products like zoom phone zoom roomsltbrgtltbrgtzoom video webinars zoom apps and onzoomltbrgtltbrgtwere problemsolvers and selfstarters working at a fast pace to design solutions with our customers and users in mind here youll work across teams to dig deep into impactful projects that are changing the way people communicate and enjoy opportunities to advance your career in a diverse inclusive environmentltbrgtltbrgtthe data science team lies at the foundation of zooms success youll be working crossfunctionally with teams of engineers scientists marketers and product professionals on some of the most critical projects in the company whether its exploratory research to predict user behavior or running experiments to optimize untapped areas of growth or developing machine learning models that deliver happiness to our users more consistently and at scaleltbrgtltbrgtif you are passionate about data engineering and looking to join a fun and fastmoving team wed love to meet you our team is taking zooms data culture to the next level by integrating predictive models into our infrastructure and we are looking for someone like you to help us get there this role is based in most places in the usltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtresponsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtpartner with architecture and other senior leads to address the data needs of our rapidlygrowing businessltligtltligtjoin a group of passionate people committed to delivering happiness to our users and to each otherltligtltligtpartner with data scientists sales marketing operation and product teams to build and deploy machine learning models that unlock growthltligtltligtbuild custom integrations between cloudbased systems using apisltligtltligtwrite complex and efficient code to transform raw data sources into easily accessible models by coding across several languages such as java python scala and or sqlltligtltligtdesign build and launch new data models that provide intuitive analytics to the teamltligtltligtbuild data expertise and own data quality for the pipelines you createltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtrequirementsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtbachelorsmasters degree in computer science management of information systems or equivalentltligtltligtthree or more years of relevant software engineering experience python scala and java in a datafocused roleltligtltligtpassion for creating data infrastructure technologies from scratch using the right tools for the jobltligtltligtexperience in solving complex data processing and storage challenges through scalable faulttolerant architectureltligtltligtexperience in designing and building highly scalable and reliable data pipelines using bigdata airflow python redshiftsnowflakeltligtltligtsoftware development experience with proficiency in python java scala or another languageltligtltligtpassionate about data engineering analytics distributed systems and solving complex data problemsltligtltligtprior experience shipping scalable data solutions in the cloud aws azure gcp and database technologies such as snowflake redshift sqlnosql and or columnar databasesltbrgtltligtltulgtensuring a diverse and inclusive workplace where we learn from each other is core to zooms values we welcome people of different backgrounds experiences abilities and perspectives including qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records as well as any qualified applicants requiring reasonable accommodations in accordance with the lawltbrgtltbrgtwe believe that the unique contributions of all zoomies is the driver of our success to make sure that our products and culture continue to incorporate everyones perspectives and experience we never discriminate on the basis of race religion national origin gender identity or expression sexual orientation age or marital veteran or disability statusltbrgtltbrgtall your information will be kept confidential according to eeo guidelinesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtexplore zoomltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligthear from our leadership teamltligtltligtbrowse awards and employee reviews on comparablyltligtltligtvisit our blogltligtltligtzoom with usltligtltligtfind us on social at the links below and on instagramltligtltulgt
